meanings.definition: Unable to be recovered or regained.
meanings.sent1: The lost toy was unrecoverable, never to be found again.
meanings.sent2: The data on the corrupted hard drive was unrecoverable.
meanings.sent3: The recipe was unrecoverable after the dog ate it.
meanings.sent4: Her trust in him was unrecoverable, like shattered glass.
meanings.sent5: The sunken ship was unrecoverable from the depths of the ocean.

meanings.definition: Not able to be retrieved or salvaged.
meanings.sent1: The burnt toast was unrecoverable, beyond repair.
meanings.sent2: The damaged painting was unrecoverable despite restoration attempts.
meanings.sent3: The lost key was unrecoverable, causing a frantic search.
meanings.sent4: His reputation was unrecoverable after the scandal.
meanings.sent5: The broken vase was unrecoverable, shattered into pieces.
